Class: ListController

Controllers~ListController(parent, type)

Parent controller for rendering and manipulating a list of child objects in parent models. i.e. Rendering each Todo in an array of Todos in a parent Project model. View

Constructor

new ListController(parent, type)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
parent DataModel Source parent model. Must contain an array called 'list' containing derived data model types
type string Type of parent model, i.e 'ProjectList', 'Project', 'Todo'. Values according to the keys here

remove(id)

'Deletes' child object by hiding it then runs update() above. View renderer ignores objects with visislbe = false. This design decision is explained at the Model class.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
id number child objects id, AKA it's index

Toggle the status (done or not) of a model or child and add/remove a 'done' class to the relevant view element

id number ID/index of the model/child to toggle

update()

Update procedure after model manipulations that affect view elements. 1. Save Project List instance in local storage 2. Re-render view elements 3. Set relevant event listeners
